root.ITEM_DESCRIPTION_TYPE1: Entry-level pistol, but in skilled hands can save the life of an experienced stalker. Made in Russia, where it was in service in the branches of law enforcement and armed forces, as personal weapons officers.
root.ITEM_DESCRIPTION_TYPE2: AK-74 - simple, reliable and cheap-in-use weapon. It's a not big mystery how it end up in the Zone.
root.ITEM_DESCRIPTION_TYPE3: Submachine gun made ​​in Germany (mounted silencer), having a high rate and good accuracy, is an indispensable weapon melee, in view of the low-energy bullets at the middle and long distance is not very effective.
root.ITEM_DESCRIPTION_TYPE4: Semi-automatic sniper rifle - a great weapon, made ​​in Switzerland
root.ITEM_DESCRIPTION_TYPE6: Silent sniper rifle. Established in CRI "Tochmash" Klimovsk in the early 1980s under the leadership of Peter Serdyukov. Made in Russia for intelligence units and special forces. Thanks to a subsonic cartridge and integrated muffler has a lower noise level and brightness of the flash shots, but the maximum distance of much less than most sniper rifles.
root.ITEM_DESCRIPTION_TYPE7: The upgraded version of the automatic rifle, made ​​in Russia, has better accuracy and stability of the barrel when fired.
root.ITEM_DESCRIPTION_TYPE9: Automatic shotgun, massively produced in Russia for hunting purposes, the same way massively used by different security companies. Thanks to the automatic recharge, can give an incredible damage in melee, therefore he became a favorite weapon of stalkers. Also, when charging a fraction - does damage to multiple targets, in the spot lesions.
root.ITEM_DESCRIPTION_TYPE10: Self-loading rifle, made ​​in USA. There was at attempt to combine, the Army rifle М1 and a new bullet at a time with a low-impact 5,56x45. The result is an automatic rifle, was popular in the U.S. police forces (including such major police forces, as the police department in New York City — NYPD, and police the State of Texas - Texas DPS), and was popular as a civilian weapon.
root.ITEM_DESCRIPTION_TYPE11: Legendary gun, developed in USA and modified in Israel. Uses revolver .38 caliber cartridge, which explains high energy shot. Due to its weight, has good accuracy, but too heavy for the novice shooters.
root.ITEM_DESCRIPTION_TYPE12: Belgian automatic assault rifle. It the present really popular, using 7.62x52 ammo. The characteristic feature of most modifications of this weapon are dioptric sight and foresight, located on the front part of the gas operated device. It is a weapon of battle on the middle distance.
root.ITEM_DESCRIPTION_TYPE13: French automatic rifle, caliber 5.56 mm, "bullpup". No more, no less.
root.ITEM_DESCRIPTION_TYPE94: Walter WA-2000 (Limited time Premium item. It'll be available 180 days after purchasing.)
root.ITEM_DESCRIPTION_TYPE206: Looks like the "Screen" but doesn't work.
root.ITEM_DESCRIPTION_TYPE207: Unique Artifact. It can be found only in th every center of Vesuvius
root.ITEM_DESCRIPTION_TYPE306: Night binoculars. Default button for activating and deactivating nightvision is N
root.ITEM_DESCRIPTION_TYPE1184: Unusaul cigarettes which Barman sells. He stuffs them with part of local herbs.
root.ITEM_DESCRIPTION_TYPE1682: This knife belonged to Kochergov's friend.
